short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to filter and display similar Codeforces problems based on rating, tags and solved count.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension that helps find similar problems on Codeforces. Finding similar problems is based on various factors like rating, tags and few more things.
